item.title: The |xam names of some of Mkuan's relations
item.summary: Mkuan gives the names of some of his relations, namely his paternal grandfather and two of his children.
item.comments: 1) See also Words and sentences: Mkuan at the Breakwater and At Breakwater, 17 April 1880, 2) This story is found in Book XV-1
item.author: Mkuan (XV)
